registration.name_form_subtitle:
We'd love to get to know you better.
What's your name?
registration.name_length_error_message: ⚠ Name must be at least 3 characters long
registration.username_form_title: Great! Let's set up your username
registration.username_length_error_message: ⚠ Username must be at least 2 characters long
registration.email_form_title: Awesome! Now we need your email
registration.email_form_subtitle: We'll use it to send you notifications about your events
registration.password_form_title: Almost there! Now we need your password
registration.password_form_subtitle: We'll use it to log you in
registration.password_length_error_message: ⚠ Password must be at least 6 characters long
